articles.description: Oral Roberts, Oregon State and Syracuse are still standing. ESPN.com panelists identified which underdogs will join them on Monday, along with their big takeaways from Sunday's games.
articles.content: Sunday's NCAA tournament second round was weird and wild from start to finish, with Loyola Chicago starting things off by handling top-seeded Illinois and upsets by No. 11 seed Syracuse, No. 15 Oral … [+11922 chars]
